reviews.review: If you are COD players, this game is not for you. If you want play a skilled game with tactics, spray control, and team game... This game is for you
if you want to aim down to shoot straight, go for this game
Was it the Russians who made this game?
I dont necessarilly like the new idea of having a "battle pass" type of rewards system. It doesnt change the gameplay but it changes the whole community market with the value of different skins
counter ı mutleplayer ortama tasıması cok guzel
Игра прикольная, но что бы нормально играть, надо купить прайм.Хотя на прайме иногда тоже дебилы с читами попадаются.Несмотря на все это,я советую поиграть.
El juego es muy bueno, me encanta, le he jugado bastantes horas y no me canso muy recomendable.
Counterstrike is like my grandparents, I don't see them much but when I do I love them... also they're old as hell. 8/10

Too many hackers, Valve should do something about it instead of releasing stupid patches, like "improving" maps, bots or something else not that important. I think it's just all about the money, no one cares when cash is coming how legit players feel about.

This Game Is Really Fun. It doesn't seem to be dying any time soon. This game needs to make it easier to rank up on matchmaking. And the teamates that I get need to stop being afk thank you.
